Inglewood.Marlton School: Marlton School is a K-12 (K-5 for students who are not deaf)public school for deaf and hard of hearing students in Baldwin Hills, Los Angeles. This school offers a bilingual program in American Sign Language and English. Marlton was one of the first non-residential schools to be admitted to the prestigious Center for ASL/English Bilingual Education and Research (CAEBER) program called ASL/English Bilingual Professional Development (AEBPD).
